answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hello,
I found a few web links that should be useful. 

The Law Enforcement Code of Conduct from the Milwaukee County Sheriff website. It outlines the responsibilities of a police officer, use of discretion and standard of integrity. 
http://county.milwaukee.gov/LawEnforcementCodeof9154.htm
The Model Policy on Standards of Conduct from the International Association of Chiefs of Police website. “Conduct Unbecoming an officer” under IV Procedures: General Conduct addresses on and off duty conduct that reflects poorly to the officer.  http://www.theiacp.org/PoliceServices/ExecutiveServices/ProfessionalAssistance/Ethics/ModelPolicyonStandardsofConduct/tabid/196/Default.aspx

The Knowledge Network topic pages “Code of Ethics” and “Ethics” also provide numerous local government codes of ethics for employees that may be useful to go through.  Some of them include: 

Code of Ethics: Pierce County, Washington that provides the ethical standards and prohibited practices for their employees. Violations are brought to the Hearing officer and Ethics Commission. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3867/Code_of_Ethics_Pierce_County_Washington
Ethics Policy (Fire Department): Marin County, California that provides the ethical standards expected of the fire department personnel. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/1529/Ethics_Policy_Fire_Department_Marin_County_California
Employee Handbook from Forsyth County, North Carolina that discusses the County’s mission statement and outlines expectations of county employees. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9044/Employee_Handbook

I hope this is helpful,
Pooja Varma 
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org

author: [Anonymous]
text: Has anyone had to deal with a uniformed officer (or any other employee) who made disparaging remarks about your town to residents while responding to a call? Does anyone have a policy regarding this issue?
title: Disparaging Comments Made By Police Officer
